content.rendered:
Ecpp

Professor Amr Shafik is a Professor of Clinical Oncology, Ain Shams University.
He also holds the position of the managing director of Ain Shams University Cancer Center.
He is the Founder and the current CEO of Cairo Journal Club.
Prof. Amr finished his medical training in oncology in Faculty of Medicine, Ain Shams University, Cairo, Egypt & H. Lee Moffitt Cancer Center, University of South Florida, USA
